text: hey we're here with the new iPhone 7 one
of the key features of this phone is
that it's water-resistant now that
doesn't mean you should go swimming or

use it in the rain so we're going to
give it a shot and see how well it works
when it's dunked in water I have a sink
behind me I have a pitcher of water
right here and we're going to test it
out so let's take a look
previous iPhones they were slightly
water resistant there were some
unofficial tests done on it
where they could survive underwater for
a while but this is the first time that
the iPhone has been rated - the water
resistance the fingerprint sensor
doesn't work when wet so it's not going
to function perfectly while submerged
but when you take it out of the water
dry it off it'll work just fine Apple
isn't the first company to have water
resistance in a phone in fact Samsung
earlier this year launched the Galaxy s7
which can do the same thing and last
while submerged underwater so let's see
how the iPhone 7 does when completely

going to receive a call and it should
still work well underwater it's
completely submerged underwater the
phone is still functional this water
resistance feature doesn't mean it's

notice it's really hard to swipe and tap

it's not the best photo but again it
